fullText: The Addams Family is a thoroughly professional piece of commercial Broadway craftsmanship that does exactly what it sets out to do, which is to entertain families without insulting the intelligence of the adults.
dtliExcerpt: The Addams Family is a thoroughly professional piece of commercial Broadway craftsmanship that does exactly what it sets out to do, which is to entertain families without insulting the intelligence of the adults.
bwwExcerpt: If you're a New Yorker with children, or if you're bringing the family to Manhattan this summer, you'll have to go to 'The Addams Family.' It won't kill you. You'll laugh a lot, though never during the unmemorable songs, which are supposed to be funny but aren't. You're more than likely to spend a considerable part of the evening wondering how much the set cost. And as you depart the theater, you'll probably catch yourself wondering whether it was really, truly worth it to take your kids to a goodish musical whose tickets are so expensive that you can buy an iPad for less than the price of four orchestra seats.
